weka.core.distances

Class MahalanobisDistance

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.core.distances.MahalanobisDistance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, weka.core.DistanceFunction, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.core.RevisionHandler

    public class MahalanobisDistance
extends Object
implements weka.core.DistanceFunction, Serializable, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.core.RevisionHandler
    The class is responsible for calculating the mahalanobis distance in the euclidean space. All nominal/string/date attributes are ignored since for such attributes the variance/covariance cannot be calculated.
    Since:
    3.0.0
    Version:
    3.0.0
    Author:
    pawel trajdos
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
